name: ESPN Sports Connection
overview: Sports Connection is the next generation of multi-sports games that brings families and youth together in an interactive and engaging setting. Experience all of your favorite sports like never before by playing across your TV and the new Wii U GamePad, switching from multiplayer to single player and teaming up for competitive co-op. The Wii U GamePad allows up to 5 players to compete simultaneously in a variety of sports including American football, soccer and karting.
